title: Fort Sumter National Monument: Webcams
body: Webcams                       Sullivan's Island Lighthouse Mounted on the Sullivan's Island Lighthouse, this camera offers a view of Fort Sumter. The staff may also occasionally focus the camera on a number of other Charleston-area landmarks for a brief time.As the sun is more or less behind Fort Sumter in the afternoon, the best time to view the webcam is during morning hours (Eastern Time).The image will automatically update every 30 seconds. Your web browser must be configured to allow pop-up windows in order to view this webcam on your computer.   View webcam               *Note: The Webcam is currently inactive The webcam link below offers a live video feed of many historic areas visible from downtown Charleston. This webcam is hosted by a private organization not affiliated with the National Park Service. We do not endorse any goods or services that may be advertised.
